name: Geometry Wars - Crazy Joe
description:
Shoot all the Squares you can in this incremental geometry shooting game! The game features upgradeable characters, different guns and different characters. 

FEATURES
  • Endless adventure with infinite amount of levels
  • Unlock and make different strategies with different characters and guns
  • You can find the best combination of character and gun for yourself and try to get to the highest level
  • BOSS LEVELS    😈😈😈😈
  • Collect the powerUps for an enhanced combat experience
  • Vibrant and minimalistic graphics
  • NOW THE GAME IS ON EARLY ACCESS ON GOOGLE PLAY :D
